MemoryInfobox.description: 'Those who covet power will do anything to claim it. Cleanse the Greece|Greek world of these so-called Nation Leader|leaders and ensure their base falls along with them. Do this, and we may yet have Peloponnesian War|peace in our time.'

General_Description: '''Lacerated Leaders''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was charged to [[raid]] numerous [[Nation Leader|Leader]] [[Leader House|Houses]] throughout [[Greece]].
Section_Outcome: After infiltrating many leaders' estates all around Greece to burn supplies, loot riches, and kill the patrol captains guarding the home, Kassandra returned to the contact in [[Kirrha]], [[Phokis]], to receive a reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''
